start.text: Hey there. Be careful around here, things can get rough. We're keeping an eye out, though.

choices.text: Glad to see the militia stepping up.
[Survival] I've noticed a weakness in the perimeter over there. You should reinforce it.

neutral_response.text: Just watch your back. Take care.

hostile_response.text: Confidence is good, but arrogance will get you killed. Don't say I didn't warn you.

positive_response.text: We're doing our best. Every little bit helps. It's good to see a friendly face.

survival_success.text: Hey, you're right. Good eye. Thanks for the tip, we'll get that sorted out.
